snippet: The country accused the United States “politicizing” the assistance, but still indicated that it may be willing to engage Washington.
abstract: North Korea accuses the United States of 'politicizing' food aid, saying the humanitarian aid is predicated on North Korea halting its uranium enrichment program, but still indicates it may be willing to engage Washington.
lead_paragraph: The country accused the United States “politicizing” the assistance, but still indicated that it may be willing to engage Washington.

headline.seo: North Korea Open to Talks on Nuclear Program
headline.main: North Korea Open to Talks on Nuclear Program
headline.print_headline: North Korea Suggests That It Is Open to More Nuclear Talks
